duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary interface for TbV Tier 2 Master Agents and build strong relationships with them.
Identify opportunities and lead account strategy and planning discussions with Master Agents.
Develop and influence Master Agent distribution growth strategy for TbV Retail.
Work closely with channel leadership in the consumer experience, sales, and analytics organizations to drive and manage distribution growth of accounts.
Produce and present creative, compelling proposals, presentations, and business reviews to express Total by Verizon's key initiatives and expectations from a distribution and growth perspective.
Assess the performance of each agent and retailer, and develop a tailored plan on a monthly basis to improve productivity.
Measure and monitor KPIs for respective Indirect Partners, developing and executing plans to meet and exceed sales targets.
Negotiate effectively to balance the needs of all involved.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience, and two or more years of Indirect channel experience (MBA, or M.S. in related fields preferred).
